net.sourceforge.JDash.ecu.comm
Class SSPMonitor

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.JDash.ecu.comm.BaseMonitor
      net.sourceforge.JDash.ecu.comm.RS232Monitor
          net.sourceforge.JDash.ecu.comm.SSPMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, ECUMonitor
public class SSPMonitor
extends RS232Monitor

This concrete monitor class can communicate with an SSM protocol capable ECU like a Subaru. Usefull Links http://scoobypedia.co.uk/index.php/Knowledge/ReadingAndReflashingECUs http://www.scoobypedia.co.uk/index.php/Knowledge/ECUVersionCompatibilityList#toc3 http://www.enginuity.org/search.php?search_id=1844875639&start=105 http://www.vwrx.com/index.php?pg=selectmonitor
